snippet: Some of the 100 Americans who went to Syria and Iraq to join up with radical groups like Islamic State have returned to the United States, U.S. officials said on Monday, amid fears that such foreign fighters could pose a security threat at home....

headline.print_headline: FBI Watching Some Americans Who Returned From Syria Conflict
headline.main: FBI Watching Some Americans Who Returned From Syria Conflict

lead_paragraph: Some of the 100 Americans who went to Syria and Iraq to join up with radical groups like Islamic State have returned to the United States, U.S. officials said on Monday, amid fears that such foreign fighters could pose a security threat at home.
